Class SearchTest

java.lang.Object
com.challenge.test.SearchTest
public class SearchTest extends Object
This class isolates the search tests
Author:
Jorge Canario

  • Method Details

    • beforeClass

      @BeforeClass public void beforeClass​(String url, String browser)
      This method runs before the execution of the class and setups everything for correct execution. In this case prepares the connection of the drivers of the browser
      Parameters:
      url - the URL of the page that wants to be tested
      browser - the browser that will be used for the test

    • aSearchFor_ExistingProduct_ShowResult

      public void aSearchFor_ExistingProduct_ShowResult​(String input)
      This test validates all products listed in the index's popular section returns a result when searched on the searchbox
      Parameters:
      input - the data that the test will use provided by 'existingProducts' method

    • existingProducts

      @DataProvider(name="existingProducts") public Object[] existingProducts()
      This is the method that prepares the existing data for the test. It provides the data the 'aSearchFor_ExistingProduct_ShowResult' test will use It will gather all the items listed in the index's popular section and provide it as data to the 'aSearchFor_ExistingProduct_ShowResult' test
      Returns:
      the object with all the data the 'aSearchFor_ExistingProduct_ShowResult' test will use

    • aSearchFor_UnexistingProduct_ShowNoResult

      public void aSearchFor_UnexistingProduct_ShowNoResult​(String input)
      This test validates unexistent products doesn't return results in the searhbox
      Parameters:
      input - the data that the test will use provided by 'unexistingProducts' method

    • unexistingProducts

      @DataProvider(name="unexistingProducts") public Object[] unexistingProducts()
      This is the method that prepares the unexisting data for the test. It provides the data the 'aSearchFor_UnexistingProduct_ShowNoResult' test will use
      Returns:
      the object with all the data the 'aSearchFor_UnexistingProduct_ShowNoResult' test will use

    • afterClass

      @AfterClass public void afterClass()
      This method run after the execution of the class and prepares everything to get back to normal. In this case close connection of the drivers of the browser
